General.Name: Fujian Oriental Silver Star Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: GEN-S POWER Group Co.,Ltd engages in the bulk commodity supply chain management business in China. It trades coal and coke. The company was formerly known as Fujian Oriental Silver Star Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to GEN-S POWER Group Co.,Ltd in May 2023. GEN-S POWER Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Zhonggeng Global Creative Center, Shanghai, China, 201102

1.Name: Mr. Lei  Tian
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
